radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral dysplastic kidneys with numerous cysts but no enlargement of overall kidney size. The urinary tract showed no abnormalities.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the brain

radiographic_examinations.findings: Hyperechogenic liver without focal abnormality, normal-appearing gallbladder, and common bile duct.
Small atrial septal defect (ASD) and mild left-sided peripheral pulmonary stenosis.
